pages.text: Lacking the essential herbs that would make it into a fully functioning $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$(), this decorative variant burns perpetually once placed.$(br2)It also produces light & heat, allowing the effect of a permanently burning pyre.
$(warning) Like normal $(l:crafting/pyres)pyres$(), this counts as a ticking tile entity and may have a performance impact when used in large quantities.
